In**"}},"viz_qsGlyxkH":{"type":"splunk.rectangle"},"viz_1Hnxh8th":{"type":"splunk.rectangle","options":{"strokeColor":"#294e70","fillColor":"#3d372f"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:weight 
| chart avg(weight) OVER _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}},"name":"weightnum"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:weight
| eval fat_perc=fat/100
| eval fat_weight=weight*fat_perc
| eval lean_mass=weight-fat_weight
| chart values(fat_weight) as "Body Fat" values(lean_mass) as "Lean Mass" by day","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:weight | timechart values(fat) as Fat span=1d","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:weight | timechart values(BMI) as BMI span=1d","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_QbUFyZA4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:calories" level!=level
| stats sum(value) AS CaloriesOut by date 
| eval "Calories Out"=round(CaloriesOut,0)
| chart values("Calories Out")"},"name":"Search_1"},"ds_EFF1P8jb_ds_QbUFyZA4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:food logId!=logId 
| chart sum(calories) AS "Calories In" by _time"},"name":"Search_1 copy 1"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"","options":{"token":"field1","defaultValue":"@w0,now"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":1300,"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"cover","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://635397f1b8fc5709375ce2db"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_1Hnxh8th","type":"block","position":{"x":90,"y":170,"w":1020,"h":710}},{"item":"viz_qsGlyxkH","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":120,"w":440,"h":190}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":90,"y":320,"w":490,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":640,"y":170,"w":460,"h":220}},{"item":"viz_chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":640,"y":500,"w":480,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_chart_4","type":"block","position":{"x":90,"y":650,"w":490,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_muG1azwh","type":"block","position":{"x":1120,"y":1220,"w":60,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_wTb4Z6pM","type":"block","position":{"x":70,"y":200,"w":190,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_S8gTLT4r","type":"block","position":{"x":290,"y":200,"w":190,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_5g7UGNub","type":"block","position":{"x":90,"y":170,"w":90,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_d9mvc1Vq","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":170,"w":90,"h":30}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"description":"","title":"Weight Clone"}
